snippet: The new listing is the biggest in Asia so far this year as brokerage firms’ shares rise along with the boom.
lead_paragraph: The new listing is the biggest in Asia so far this year as brokerage firms’ shares rise along with the boom.

headline.main: Fueled by Market Rally in China, GF Securities Raises $3.6 Billion in I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: Fueled by Market Rally in China, GF Securities Raises $3.6 Billion in I.P.O.
